TopicTitle: I cannot Install USI colonization systems. Help please.

Articles.Content: So i tried to install usi kolonization systems and i put the usi kolonization systems folder in the game data folder. I launched the game, but the usi kolonization systems tab had no items in it and i could not see any content from usi kolonization systems. I looked for install tutorials, but i could not find any. I also could not find install instructions. Can someone please help me fix this?
In your GameData should be "UmbraSpaceIndustries", and inside there should be "Kolonization". What does your directory look like?
Yes picture of your game data folder please

IRRC you must unlock them in the techtree??? Just a wild guess...

Download from Kerbalstuff looks sometimes safer than from other portals... CKAN has some issues too...

Edited October 11, 2015 by Mikki
Got it installed! Im sorry for the very late reply.
